header.description: Invoice header with vendor info, customer billing/shipping addresses, invoice metadata, and customer message

rows.description: Line items for the invoice with item code, description, quantity, unit price, and line total

semantics: Vendor contact parameters (company_street_address, company_phone, company_email, company_website, company_city_state_zipcode) are pass-through values provided at runtime. Payment terms and shipping amount are also runtime parameters. All customer and invoice data are sourced from the database.
transformations: Concatenate customers.city, customers.state, customers.postal_code with format 'City, State Zipcode' for bill_to_city_state_zipcode and ship_to_city_state_zipcode
Format invoices.issue_date and invoices.due_date as MM/DD/YYYY
Format all monetary values (invoice_items.unit_price, invoice_items.line_total, invoices.subtotal, invoices.tax_amount, invoices.total_amount, shipping_amount) with 2 decimal places
